title: That report FCSSCS23-001, New Arena and Aquatics Facility Naming Rights Approval and report CSAC23-008, Community Grant History and Future Directions, be approved on Consent.
That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK23-001, dated October 10, 2023, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from MPP Smith, be received for information.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK23-001, dated October 10, 2023, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from MPP Smith, be received for information. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK23-002, dated October 10, 2023, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from the Peterborough Police Service, Fourcast, MP and CMHA, be received for information.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK23-001, dated October 10, 2023, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from MPP Smith, be received for information. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK23-002, dated October 10, 2023, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from the Peterborough Police Service, Fourcast, MP and CMHA, be received for information. a) That the presentation of the Mixed-Use Corridors Urban Design Guidelines by The Planning Partnership Ltd. and Report IPGPL23-002 be received; b) That the report be deferred until a through public consultation has been undertaken, and the report return to Council in December.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK23-001, dated October 10, 2023, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from MPP Smith, be received for information. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK23-002, dated October 10, 2023, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from the Peterborough Police Service, Fourcast, MP and CMHA, be received for information. a) That the presentation of the Mixed-Use Corridors Urban Design Guidelines by The Planning Partnership Ltd. and Report IPGPL23-002 be received; b) That the report be deferred until a through public consultation has been undertaken, and the report return to Council in December. That section 10.2 of the Procedure By-law be suspended to complete the agenda.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK23-003, dated October 10, 2023, of the City Clerk on behalf of the Citizen Appointment Selection Committee as follows: a) That Deirdre Chisholm be appointed to serve as a member of the Arts and Culture Advisory Committee with a term ending December 2026. b) That Marc Galachiuke be appointed to serve as a member of the Accessibility Advisory Committee with a term ending December 2026.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK23-003, dated October 10, 2023, of the City Clerk on behalf of the Citizen Appointment Selection Committee as follows: a) That Deirdre Chisholm be appointed to serve as a member of the Arts and Culture Advisory Committee with a term ending December 2026. b) That Marc Galachiuke be appointed to serve as a member of the Accessibility Advisory Committee with a term ending December 2026. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report IPGPL23-001, dated October 10, 2023, of the Commissioner of Infrastructure, Planning and Growth Management (Acting) as follows: a) That Report IPGPL23-001 be received for information. b) On page 186 of the report, the word “rules” be changed to “guidelines”.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK23-003, dated October 10, 2023, of the City Clerk on behalf of the Citizen Appointment Selection Committee as follows: a) That Deirdre Chisholm be appointed to serve as a member of the Arts and Culture Advisory Committee with a term ending December 2026. b) That Marc Galachiuke be appointed to serve as a member of the Accessibility Advisory Committee with a term ending December 2026. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report IPGPL23-001, dated October 10, 2023, of the Commissioner of Infrastructure, Planning and Growth Management (Acting) as follows: a) That Report IPGPL23-001 be received for information. b) On page 186 of the report, the word “rules” be changed to “guidelines”. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report MOENV23-001, dated October 10, 2023, of the Commissioner of Municipal Operations (Acting) as follows: That By-Law 18-103 be repealed and replaced as proposed in Appendix A to Report MOENV23-001.
That this meeting be adjourned at 11:39 p.m.
